Uses of Interface
eu.ehri.project.api.QueryApi

  • Packages that use QueryApi 
    Package Description
    eu.ehri.extension.base  
    eu.ehri.project.api
    Classes that provide data access data on the graph in a manner that incorporate the permission and access-control systems.
    eu.ehri.project.api.impl  

    • Uses of QueryApi in eu.ehri.extension.base

      Methods in eu.ehri.extension.base that return QueryApi 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected QueryApi AbstractResource.getQuery()
      Get a query object configured according to incoming parameters.

    • Uses of QueryApi in eu.ehri.project.api

      Methods in eu.ehri.project.api that return QueryApi 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QueryApi QueryApi.filter(Collection<String> filterSpecs)
      Set all filters for this query, parsing the key/predicate/value from string values.
      QueryApi QueryApi.filter(String key, QueryApi.FilterPredicate predicate, Object value)
      Add a filter predicate.
      QueryApi QueryApi.orderBy(Collection<String> orderSpecs)
      Set all orderings for this query, parsing the key/spec from string values.
      QueryApi QueryApi.orderBy(String key, QueryApi.Sort order)
      Set the query result order.
      QueryApi Api.query() 
      QueryApi QueryApi.setLimit(int limit)
      Set the limit of this query.
      QueryApi QueryApi.setOffset(int offset)
      Set the offset of this query.
      QueryApi QueryApi.setStream(boolean stream)
      Toggle streaming, which will disable paging totals, assuming an infinite collection.

      Handles querying Entity entities with ACL semantics.
